wpm

Class WebPageMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • saf.AppTemplate
        • wpm.WebPageMaker

  • public class WebPageMaker
extends saf.AppTemplate
    This class serves as the application class for our Web Page Maker program. Note that much of its behavior is inherited from AppTemplate, as defined in the Simple App Framework. This app starts by loading all the app-specific messages like icon files and tooltips and other settings, then the full User Interface is loaded using those settings. Note that this is a JavaFX application.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

    • Method Detail

      • makeAppBuilderHook

        public saf.components.AppComponentsBuilder makeAppBuilderHook()
        This builder provides methods for properly setting up all the custom objects needed to run this application. Note that by swapping out these components we could have a very different program that did something completely different.
        Specified by:
        makeAppBuilderHook in class saf.AppTemplate
        Returns:
        The builder object that knows how to create the proper components for this custom application.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is where program execution begins. Since this is a JavaFX app it will simply call launch, which gets JavaFX rolling, resulting in sending the properly initialized Stage (i.e. window) to the start method inherited from AppTemplate, defined in the SimpleAppFramework.
